data.name: Tearstone: Thieves of the Heart Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended)
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended)
  • Processor: 2Ghz i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 520 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 520 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
